There are two features I would like to see in Heritrix, and before I
implem=
ent them, I would like to ask if anyone else has, and if so, if
they would =
be willing to share them.

The first is to insert the results of a crawl in=
to a database (MySQL,
as usual).  I know at least two other people have gon=
e over this
before on the list, but has their code ever been suggested for
=
incorporation or made public?  (I've e-mailed them, but thought I'd
ask her=
e just in case).

The second is a programmatic interface to the WorkQueue; =
 I would like
to start a crawl with an empty queue, and as a result of proc=
essing
elsewhere, in another program, insert seeds into the queue remotely.=
 
Has anyone
written anything for this?

Regards,
Kjerken
